sentences.sentence: Most controversial are the “abate we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s” offered to big investors that exempt them from paying property taxes to the local school districts;
sentences.translation: 最具争议的问题是是否应该废除高额投资者不用向本地学校支付财产税的“消除税”。
